name: Unholy Order
description:
This is a 2.5D platformer metroidvania, where the player and npcs are 2D, and all the rest is 3D, made with the theme:

“Sometimes people don't want to hear the truth because they don't want their illusions destroyed.”
― Friedrich Nietzsche

Become one of the last Holy Knights, as he enters the last hideout of the deserters, to take out the fallen warriors, powerful monsters and those filthy traitors.

  • WASD for movement
  • J for sword
  • SPACE to jump
  • F to interact
  • K for fire spell
  • L for shield spell
  • ESC for menu

Game Designer/ Programator:  Alexandre Fontura

Art Director/ Animator: Álvaro Fagundes

Background Artist/ Writer: Rafael M. dos Santos

Concept Art/ Art : Nathália Gomes

Supervisor: Eduardo Fernando Müller

Data de Lançamento: 02.07.2021
